channel.title: Funded-projects on Tom Constant
channel.description: Recent content in Funded-projects on Tom Constant

item.title: GRASP
item.description: Working as part of the European project GRASP (Graphene-Based Single-Photon Nonlinear Optical Devices), I performed experimental studies of the nonlinear optics of surface plasmon polaritons on graphene. This project was a collaboration with ICFO, Universität Wien, Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin and The University of Exeter.
